_sText:
Map made by Dr. Staffy

Special Thx to:
Dr. Popel
JensoPenso aka Stop Hammertime
Dr. Face
Sonny aka darkilol
Bogenbernd
Dioxid3

___________________________________________________________

Installation
-------------------------------------
Just unpack the File and copy the Map to your Mapfolder.

___________________________________________________________


Content
-------------------------------------

The Map contains regular Jailfeatures like a Pool, a Cafeteria etc,
 but there are some more special Things too - like a Gaschamber,
 a Labyrinth, a Race, w/e.

There are many custom Sprites - thanks to Dr. Popel and 
JensoPenso for creating them. 

There are MANY secret ways - have Fun searching them ;-)

____________________________________________________________

Updates
-------------------------------------

08/06/10
Football is kniveable even better.
"Speedways" to Showers and the Pools.
Many Textures (e.g. Mainhall) have been changed.
Some Weapons have been removed or replaced.
The trainingsroom has been replaced by a Battle arena.
There are some new secrets. 
Fences have Borders now.


07/30/10
Football is know kniveable.
There are shorter ways to the Pool + to the Showers.
The walls around the outdoor area have been changed.
The textures of the race are completely revised.
The groupjail is smaller now.
There are some secret weapons in the Pool now.
There are grenades in the jails now.
There are some other Weapons placed in the map.
Some new secrets.

07/21/10
Finally the Map is ready for Upload. I'll wait for some critics till 
I update it. 

_____________________________________________________________

To do:

-Waiting for Feedback :p

HAVE FUN PLAYING THE MAP :-)
I'D LIKE TO HEAR IMPROVEMENT SUGGESTIONS!

Id rly like to hear some Feedback :(
